xmlText.p: TORONTO BLUE JAYS — Signed OF Curtis Granderson to a one-year contract.
MINNESOTA VIKINGS — Signed WR Cayleb Jones to a reserve-future contract.
BUFFALO SABRES — Recalled D Matt Tennyson from Rochester (AHL).
SEATTLE SOUNDERS FC — Loaned M Aaron Kovar to Los Angeles FC.
WASHINGTON SPIRIT — Acquired G Aubrey Bledsoe and a 2019 first-round draft pick from Orlando for D Shelina Zadorsky.
IOWA — Named Derrick Foster assistant football coach.
NYU — Named Andrew Brown women's volleyball coach.
OHIO STATE — Promoted Ryan Day offensive coordinator.
SYRACUSE — Announced RB Abdul Adams has transferred from Oklahoma.
WISCONSIN-OSHKOSH — Named Jon Ellmann women's volleyball coach.
